entry.title: RT lizzie 💥: I always try to stay engaged/curious about "cutting edge" tech. I've been looking for a web3 space where I can explore core tech, thin...
entry.summary: RT lizzie 💥 I always try to stay engaged/curious about "cutting edge" tech. I've been looking for a web3 space where I can explore core tech, think about building for broader audiences, and help web3 break out of its current archetypal persona. So...I've joined @developer_dao ! 🌟 #7825

entry.title: RT rahat.eth: Casually looking through @developer_dao discord and I see that there are travel sponsorships now for folks to attend DevConnect and Eth ...
entry.summary: RT rahat.eth Casually looking through @developer_dao discord and I see that there are travel sponsorships now for folks to attend DevConnect and Eth Amsterdam. This really is one of the best communities to join as someone interested in web3.

entry.title: RT Tuttle Tribe MINT NOW: 🔥 @MichelleBakels 🔥 engineers and devs unite in Miami for @ReactMiamiConf Then after all the learning we’ll celebrate...
entry.summary: RT Tuttle Tribe MINT NOW 🔥 @MichelleBakels 🔥 engineers and devs unite in Miami for @ReactMiamiConf Then after all the learning we’ll celebrate with @developer_dao at the Surfcomber for our mashup event #DefinitelyNothing Mayor Francis Suarez: Along with @MichelleBakels we’re bringing together industry leaders to share the recent developments in everything from technical writing to Web3 and everything in between! Find @ReactMiamiConf within the @eMergeAmericas Conference April 18-19
